    • getIncrementFile

      public static File getIncrementFile(String path, boolean ignoreExist) throws IOException
      Creates a new file in the given path and name. If the file already exists, a number suffix is added to the actual file name.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the file to create.
      ignoreExist - if true, no check is done and the file is returned as requested.
      Returns:
      the actual file object with the name having a suffix if already exists
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getIncrementFile

      public static File getIncrementFile(String path, String extension, boolean ignoreExist) throws IOException
      Creates a new file in the given path and name. If the file already exists, a number suffix is added to the actual file name, by respecting the given file extension.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the file to create.
      extension - provides the file extension (e.g., ".rou.xml").
      ignoreExist - if true, no check is done and the file is returned as requested.
      Returns:
      the actual file object with the name having a suffix if already exists
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getIncrementFile

      public static File getIncrementFile(File file, boolean ignoreExist) throws IOException
      Creates a new file in the given path and name. If the file already exists, a number suffix is added to the actual file name.
      Parameters:
      file - the file to create
      ignoreExist - if true, no check is done and the file is returned as requested.
      Returns:
      the actual file object with the name having a suffix if already exists
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getIncrementFile

      public static File getIncrementFile(File file, String extension, boolean ignoreExist) throws IOException
      Creates a new file in the given path and name. If the file already exists, a number suffix is added to the actual file name, by respecting the given file extension.
      Parameters:
      file - the file to create
      extension - provides the file extension (e.g., ".rou.xml").
      ignoreExist - if true, no check is done and the file is returned as requested.
      Returns:
      the actual file object with the name having a suffix if already exists
      Throws:
      IOException
